RecordOperationSpec.Name: CCH Verified
RecordOperationSpec.Description: This updates the status of a CCH to verified
RecordOperationSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPOperationImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_CHILDEXTENSION_CCHVERIFIED_UPDATE ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier ) as begin declare @pendingReasonString_NewChildVerification nvarchar(100) = 'New Child Verification'
-- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
update dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION set CCHVALIDATED = 1, DATECHANGED = getdate(), CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = @ID
exec dbo.USR_USP_CHILD_REMOVEPENDINGREASON @ID, null, @pendingReasonString_NewChildVerification, @CHANGEAGENTID exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITYCHECK @ID, null, @CHANGEAGENTID exec dbo.USR_USP_CHILD_SETELIGIBLEORPENDING @ID, 1, @CHANGEAGENTID -- 1 - Leave ineligible status, only update those pending or eligible
return 0;
end

StandardPrompt.Text: Click Yes to verify the CCH form.
